subject: p19016834
History: AF. Patient with esophageal carcinoma and pneumonia.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study,. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Esophageal stent is in unchanged position. Right lower lobe pneumonic consolidation is unchanged. Aeration of the left lower lobe has improved. There is no pneumothorax. Right pleural effusion is small and stable. Pneumoperitoneum is less conspicuous than before.
